analyzed: zhes so // chu gnyis phrad pa la tsandan gyi mandala byas te /
translated: At the confluence of two rivers, make a maṇḍala of sandalwood.

original: me tog gtor nas gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs te sdong phrag brgyad bzlas /
analyzed: me tog gtor nas gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs te sdong phrag brgyad bzlas /
translated: Scatter flowers, fumigate with gugul incense, and recite eight thousand times.

original: yang mtshan mo stong phrag gcig bzlas pas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang mtshan mo stong phrag gcig bzlas pas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, if one recites one thousand times at night, she will definitely come.

original: nub mo 'dod yon byin pas chung mar 'gyur bas tho rangs gser srang brgya byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nub mo 'dod yon byin pas chung mar 'gyur bas tho rangs gser srang brgya byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By giving her enjoyments at night, she becomes one's wife. At dawn, she will leave after being given one ounce of gold.

original: de bzhin du nyi ma re re byas pas zla ba gcig rdzogs pa'i rjes la cho ga ji ltar bzlas pas rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyi ma re re byas pas zla ba gcig rdzogs pa'i rjes la cho ga ji ltar bzlas pas rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By doing this every day, after one month is completed, she will always stay wherever one recites the ritual.

original: 'byung mo chen mo dpal mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'byung mo chen mo dpal mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Great Bhūta, Śrī Sundarī, is complete.
